dataset.sql: SELECT u.id AS user_id,s.id AS sys_id,s.sys_code,s.sys_name,u.org_id,o.org_code,o.org_name,u.dept_id,d.dept_name,u.role_id,r.role_name,u.user_name,u.real_name,u.sex,u.tel,u.phone,u.email,u.address,u.sort_num,u.status,u.createtime AS create_time,u.updatetime AS update_time FROM user u LEFT JOIN role r ON r.id = u.role_id AND r.isvalid = 1 LEFT JOIN department d ON d.id = u.dept_id AND d.isvalid = 1 LEFT JOIN organization o ON o.id = u.org_id AND o.isvalid = 1 LEFT JOIN system s ON s.id = o.sys_id AND s.isvalid = 1 WHERE u.isvalid = 1 $dynamicsql ORDER BY u.status DESC,u.sort_num

SELECT u.id AS user_id,s.id AS sys_id,s.sys_code,s.sys_name,u.org_id,o.org_code,o.org_name,u.dept_id,d.dept_name,u.role_id,u.user_name,u.real_name,u.sex,u.tel,u.phone,u.email,u.address,u.sort_num,u.status,u.createtime AS create_time,u.updatetime AS update_time FROM user u LEFT JOIN department d ON d.id = u.dept_id AND d.isvalid = 1 LEFT JOIN organization o ON o.id = u.org_id AND o.isvalid = 1 LEFT JOIN system s ON s.id = o.sys_id AND s.isvalid = 1 WHERE u.isvalid = 1 $dynamicsql
UPDATE user SET org_id =?, dept_id =?, role_id =?, user_name =?, real_name =?, sex =?, tel =?, phone =?, email =?, address =?, sort_num =? WHERE id =?
UPDATE user SET status = ? WHERE id = ?
UPDATE user SET user_pwd = ? WHERE id = ?
SELECT COUNT(id) AS num FROM user WHERE user_pwd = ? AND id = ?

SELECT u.id AS user_id,u.real_name,u.org_id,u.status,o.org_name,o.org_code,u.dept_id,d.dept_name,d.dept_code,s.sys_code,s.id AS sys_id FROM user u INNER JOIN organization o ON o.id = u.org_id AND o.status = 1 AND o.isvalid = 1 INNER JOIN department d ON d.id = u.dept_id AND d.status = 1 AND d.isvalid = 1 INNER JOIN system s ON s.id = o.sys_id AND s.status = 1 WHERE u.isvalid = 1 AND u.user_name = ? AND u.user_pwd = ? AND s.sys_code = ?

SELECT rs.res_id,s.res_name,s.show_name,s.res_type,s.url,s.parent_id,s.res_icon,s.status,s.sort_num FROM user u INNER JOIN role r ON u.role_id = r.id AND r.status = 1 AND r.isvalid = 1 INNER JOIN role_resource rs ON rs.role_id = r.id AND rs.isvalid = 1 INNER JOIN resource s ON s.id = rs.res_id AND s.status = 1 AND s.isvalid = 1 WHERE u.isvalid = 1 AND u.id = ? ORDER BY s.sort_num
